channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Berkshire Hathaway annual meeting: Buffett says 'trade should not be a weapon'
Trump posts AI-generated photo of himself dressed as the pope
item.description: President Trump earlier this year jokingly called himself a "king" after he moved to end the congestion pricing program in New York City.

item.title: Big Tech showed it won’t back down on AI spending. Some on Wall Street are wary
Social Security seems much less secure 100 days into Trump’s second term
Buffett says it's time for Greg Abel to take over as Berkshire CEO at year's end
Follow live coverage and analysis of Berkshire Hathaway's annual meeting
Trump vows to revoke Harvard's tax-exempt status: 'It's what they deserve!'
item.description: Trump has sought to extract concessions and changes from Harvard and other schools by threatening to withhold federal research grants.

item.title: Trump plans to unveil federal budget proposal on Friday
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump plans to unveil his budget proposal for the 2026 fiscal year on Friday and send it to Congress, according to a White House...

item.title: Waltz used Signal-like app at White House day before ouster as national security advisor
item.description: President Trump recently discouraged the use of the Signal app after controversy over a group chat of administration officials detailed military plans...

item.title: Trump calls on Fed once again to lower rates after solid April jobs report
item.description: President Donald Trump issued his latest call for the U.S. Federal Reserve to lower interest rates, following a better-than-expected jobs report for A...
